title: NH4Cl dissolves - sign on delta H and delta S

content.question: When solid ammonium chloride, NH4Cl(s), is added to water at 25oC, it dissolves and the temperature of the solution decreases. Which of the following is true for the values of ΔH and ΔS for the dissolving process?

topic.text: 9.3: Gibbs Free Energy and Thermodynamic Favorability

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
